   20: 
   21: -module(wrap_log_reader_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %%-define(debug, true).
   24: 
   25: -ifdef(debug).
   26: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   27: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   28: -define(privdir(_), "./disk_log_SUITE_priv").
   29: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   33: -define(privdir(Conf), proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -endif.
   35: 
   36: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   37: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   38: 	 no_file/1,
   39: 	 one_empty/1, one_filled/1,
   40: 	 two_filled/1,
   41: 	 four_filled/1,
   42: 	 wrap_filled/1,
   43: 	 wrapping/1,
   44: 	 external/1,
   45: 	 error/1]).
   46: 
   47: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   52: 
   53: all() -> 
   54:     [no_file, {group, one}, {group, two}, {group, four},
   55:      {group, wrap}, wrapping, external, error].
   56: 
   57: groups() -> 
   58:     [{one, [], [one_empty, one_filled]},
   59:      {two, [], [two_filled]}, {four, [], [four_filled]},
   60:      {wrap, [], [wrap_filled]}].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: 
   75: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   79:     ok.
   80: 
   81: %% No log file exists.
   82: no_file(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
   83:     code:add_path(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Conf)),
   84:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
   85:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
   86:     delete_files(File),
   87:     start(),
   88: 
   89:     wlt ! {open, self(), File},
   90:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
   91:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 1},
   92:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
   93:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 4},
   94:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
   95: 
   96:     stop(),
   97:     delete_files(File),
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: 
  101: %% One empty index file.
  102: one_empty(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  103:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  104:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  105:     delete_files(File),
  106:     start(),
  107: 
  108:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  109:     %% open
  110:     do_chunk([{open,File}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  111:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  112:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 2},
  113:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 2)}}, ?LINE),
  114:     close(sune),
  115: 
  116:     %% closed
  117:     do_chunk([{open,File}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  118:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  119:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 2},
  120:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 2)}}, ?LINE),
  121: 
  122:     stop(),
  123:     delete_files(File),
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: %% One filled index file.
  127: one_filled(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  128:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  129:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  130:     delete_files(File),
  131:     start(),
  132: 
  133:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  134:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, one", "first round, two"]),
  135:     sync(sune),
  136:     %% open
  137:     test_one(File),
  138:     close(sune),
  139:     %% closed
  140:     test_one(File),
  141: 
  142:     stop(),
  143:     delete_files(File),
  144:     ok.
  145: 
  146: test_one(File) ->
  147:     do_chunk([{open,File},
  148: 	      {chunk, ["first round, one", "first round, two"]},
  149: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  150:     do_chunk([{open,File,1},
  151: 	      {chunk, ["first round, one", "first round, two"]},
  152: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  153:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 2},
  154:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 2)}}, ?LINE),
  155:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, one"]},
  156: 	      {chunk, 1, ["first round, two"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: 
  160: %% Two filled index files.
  161: two_filled(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  162:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  163:     File = list_to_atom(join(Dir, "sune.LOG")),
  164:     delete_files(File),
  165:     start(),
  166: 
  167:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  168:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]),
  169:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]),
  170:     sync(sune),
  171:     %% open
  172:     test_two(File),
  173:     close(sune),
  174:     %% closed
  175:     test_two(File),
  176: 
  177:     stop(),
  178:     delete_files(File),
  179:     ok.
  180: 
  181: test_two(File) ->
  182:     do_chunk([{open,File},
  183: 	      {chunk, infinity, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]},
  184: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  185: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  186:     do_chunk([{open,File,1},
  187: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]},
  188: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  189:     do_chunk([{open,File,2},
  190: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  191: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  192:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 3},
  193:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 3)}}, ?LINE),
  194:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 11"]},
  195: 	      {chunk, 2, ["first round, 12"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  196:     ok.
  197: 
  198: 
  199: %% Four filled index files.
  200: four_filled(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  201:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  202:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  203:     delete_files(File),
  204:     start(),
  205: 
  206:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  207:     init_files(0),
  208:     sync(sune),
  209:     %% open
  210:     test_four(File),
  211:     close(sune),
  212:     %% closed
  213:     test_four(File),
  214: 
  215:     stop(),
  216:     delete_files(File),
  217:     ok.
  218: 
  219: test_four(File) ->
  220:     do_chunk([{open,File},
  221: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]},
  222: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  223: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]},
  224: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]},
  225: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  226:     do_chunk([{open,File,1},
  227: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]},
  228: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  229:     do_chunk([{open,File,4},
  230: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]},
  231: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  232:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 5},
  233:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 5)}}, ?LINE),
  234:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 11"]},
  235: 	      {chunk, 2, ["first round, 12"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  236:     do_chunk([{open,File,4}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 41"]},
  237: 	      {chunk, 2, ["first round, 42"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  238:     ok.
  239: 
  240: 
  241: %% First wrap, open, filled index file.
  242: wrap_filled(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  243:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  244:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  245:     delete_files(File),
  246:     start(),
  247: 
  248:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  249:     init_files(0),
  250:     log_terms(sune, ["second round, 11", "second round, 12"]),
  251:     sync(sune),
  252:     %% open
  253:     test_wrap(File),
  254:     close(sune),
  255:     %% closed
  256:     test_wrap(File),
  257: 
  258:     stop(),
  259:     delete_files(File),
  260:     ok.
  261: 
  262: test_wrap(File) ->
  263:     do_chunk([{open,File},
  264: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  265: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]},
  266: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]},
  267: 	      {chunk, ["second round, 11", "second round, 12"]},
  268: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  269:     do_chunk([{open,File,1},
  270: 	      {chunk, ["second round, 11", "second round, 12"]},
  271: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  272:     do_chunk([{open,File,2},
  273: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  274: 	      eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  275:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 5},
  276:     rec({error, {file_not_found, add_ext(File, 5)}}, ?LINE),
  277:     do_chunk([{open,File,1}, {chunk, 1, ["second round, 11"]},
  278: 	      {chunk, 2, ["second round, 12"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  279:     do_chunk([{open,File,4}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 41"]},
  280: 	      {chunk, 2, ["first round, 42"]}, eof], wlt, ?LINE),
  281:     ok.
  282: 
  283: %% Wrapping at the same time as reading.
  284: wrapping(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  285:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  286:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  287:     delete_files(File),
  288:     start(),
  289: 
  290:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  291:     init_files(1100),
  292:     sync(sune),
  293:     C1 =
  294: 	do_chunk([{open,File}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 11"]}], wlt, ?LINE),
  295:     log_terms(sune, ["second round, 11", "second round, 12"]),
  296:     sync(sune),
  297:     do_chunk([{chunk, 1, ["first round, 12"]},
  298: 	      %% Here two bad bytes are found.
  299: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  300: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]},
  301: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]}, eof],
  302: 	     wlt, ?LINE, C1),
  303:     start(),
  304:     delete_files(File),
  305:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  306:     init_files(1100),
  307:     sync(sune),
  308:     C2 =
  309: 	do_chunk([{open,File}, {chunk, 1, ["first round, 11"]}], wlt, ?LINE),
  310:     log_terms(sune, ["second round, 11", "second round, 12"]),
  311:     close(sune),
  312:     do_chunk([{chunk, 1, ["first round, 12"]},
  313: 	      %% Here two bad bytes are found.
  314: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]},
  315: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]},
  316: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]}, eof],
  317: 	     wlt, ?LINE, C2),
  318:     start(),
  319:     delete_files(File),
  320:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  321:     init_files(1100),
  322:     sync(sune),
  323:     C3 = do_chunk([{open,File}], wlt, ?LINE),
  324:     log_terms(sune, ["second round, 11"]),
  325:     sync(sune),
  326:     do_chunk([{chunk, 1, ["second round, 11"]},
  327: 	      {chunk, 1, ["first round, 21"]},
  328: 	      {chunk, 1, ["first round, 22"]},
  329: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]},
  330: 	      {chunk, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]}, eof],
  331: 	     wlt, ?LINE, C3),
  332: 
  333:     stop(),
  334:     delete_files(File),
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: %% External format.
  338: external(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  339:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  340:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  341:     delete_files(File),
  342:     start(),
  343: 
  344:     open_ext(sune, File, ?FILE),
  345:     init_files_ext(0),
  346:     close(sune),
  347:     P0 = pps(),
  348:     wlt ! {open, self(), File},
  349:     rec({error, {not_a_log_file, add_ext(File, 1)}}, ?LINE),
  350:     check_pps(P0),
  351: 
  352:     stop(),
  353:     delete_files(File),
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: %% Error situations.
  357: error(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  358:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  359:     File = join(Dir, "sune.LOG"),
  360:     delete_files(File),
  361:     start(),
  362: 
  363:     P0 = pps(),
  364:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 1},
  365:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
  366:     wlt ! {open, self(), File},
  367:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
  368:     check_pps(P0),
  369: 
  370:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  371:     close(sune),
  372:     P1 = pps(),
  373:     First = add_ext(File, 1),
  374:     ok = file:delete(First),
  375:     wlt ! {open, self(), File},
  376:     rec({error, {not_a_log_file, First}}, ?LINE),
  377:     check_pps(P1),
  378: 
  379:     delete_files(File),
  380:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  381:     init_files(0),
  382:     close(sune),
  383:     P2 = pps(),
  384:     C = do_chunk([{open,File},
  385: 		  {chunk, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]}],
  386: 		 wlt, ?LINE),
  387:     Second = add_ext(File, 2),
  388:     ok = file:delete(Second),
  389:     wlt ! {chunk, self(), C},
  390:     rec({error, {file_error, Second, {error, enoent}}}, ?LINE),
  391:     ok = file:write_file(Second, <<17:(3*8)>>), % three bytes
  392:     wlt ! {chunk, self(), C},
  393:     rec({error, {not_a_log_file, Second}}, ?LINE),
  394:     do_chunk([close], wlt, ?LINE, C),
  395:     check_pps(P2),
  396: 
  397:     delete_files(File),
  398:     open(sune, File, ?LINE),
  399:     init_files(0),
  400:     close(sune),
  401:     P3 = pps(),
  402:     timer:sleep(1100),
  403:     Now = calendar:local_time(),
  404:     ok = file:change_time(First, Now),
  405:     C2 = do_chunk([{open,File},
  406: 		   {chunk, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]}],
  407: 		  wlt, ?LINE),
  408:     wlt ! {chunk, self(), C2},
  409:     rec({error,{is_wrapped,First}}, ?LINE),
  410:     do_chunk([close], wlt, ?LINE, C2),
  411:     IndexFile = add_ext(File, idx),
  412:     ok = file:write_file(IndexFile, <<17:(3*8)>>),
  413:     wlt ! {open, self(), File, 1},
  414:     rec({error, {index_file_not_found, File}}, ?LINE),
  415:     check_pps(P3),
  416: 
  417:     stop(),
  418:     delete_files(File),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: start() ->
  422:     ok = wrap_log_test:stop(),
  423:     dl_wait(),
  424:     ok = wrap_log_test:init().
  425: 
  426: stop() ->
  427:     ok = wrap_log_test:stop(),
  428:     dl_wait().
  429: 
  430: %% Give disk logs opened by 'wlr_logger' and 'wlt' time to close after
  431: %% receiving EXIT signals.
  432: dl_wait() ->
  433:     case disk_log:all() of
  434:         [] ->
  435:             ok;
  436:         _X ->
  437:             erlang:display(_X),
  438:             timer:sleep(100),
  439:             dl_wait()
  440:     end.
  441: 
  442: delete_files(File) ->
  443:     file:delete(add_ext(File, idx)),
  444:     file:delete(add_ext(File, siz)),
  445:     file:delete(add_ext(File, 1)),
  446:     file:delete(add_ext(File, 2)),
  447:     file:delete(add_ext(File, 3)),
  448:     file:delete(add_ext(File, 4)),
  449:     ok.
  450: 
  451: init_files(Delay) ->
  452:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]),
  453:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  454:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]),
  455:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  456:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]),
  457:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  458:     log_terms(sune, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]),
  459:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  460:     ok.
  461: 
  462: init_files_ext(Delay) ->
  463:     blog_terms(sune, ["first round, 11", "first round, 12"]),
  464:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  465:     blog_terms(sune, ["first round, 21", "first round, 22"]),
  466:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  467:     blog_terms(sune, ["first round, 31", "first round, 32"]),
  468:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  469:     blog_terms(sune, ["first round, 41", "first round, 42"]),
  470:     timer:sleep(Delay),
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: join(A, B) ->
  474:     filename:nativename(filename:join(A, B)).
  475: 
  476: do_chunk(Commands, Server, Where) ->
  477:     do_chunk(Commands, Server, Where, foo).
  478: 
  479: do_chunk([{open, File, One} | Cs], S, W, _C) ->
  480:     S ! {open, self(), File, One},
  481:     NC = rec1(ok, {W,?LINE}),
  482:     do_chunk(Cs, S, W, NC);
  483: do_chunk([{open, File} | Cs], S, W, _C) ->
  484:     S ! {open, self(), File},
  485:     NC = rec1(ok, {W,?LINE}),
  486:     do_chunk(Cs, S, W, NC);
  487: do_chunk([{chunk, Terms} | Cs], S, W, C) ->
  488:     S ! {chunk, self(), C},
  489:     NC = rec2(Terms, {W,?LINE}),
  490:     do_chunk(Cs, S, W, NC);
  491: do_chunk([{chunk, N, Terms} | Cs], S, W, C) ->
  492:     S ! {chunk, self(), C, N},
  493:     NC = rec2(Terms, {W,?LINE}),
  494:     do_chunk(Cs, S, W, NC);
  495: do_chunk([eof], S, W, C) ->
  496:     S ! {chunk, self(), C},
  497:     C1 = rec2(eof, {W,?LINE}),
  498:     do_chunk([close], S, W, C1);
  499: do_chunk([close], S, W, C) ->
  500:     S ! {close, self(), C},
  501:     rec(ok, {W,?LINE});
  502: do_chunk([], _S, _W, C) ->
  503:     C.
  504: 
  505: add_ext(Name, Ext) ->
  506:     lists:concat([Name, ".", Ext]).
  507: 
  508: %% disk_log.
  509: open(Log, File, Where) ->
  510:     wlr_logger ! {open, self(), Log, File},
  511:     rec1(ok, Where).
  512: 
  513: open_ext(Log, File, Where) ->
  514:     wlr_logger ! {open_ext, self(), Log, File},
  515:     rec1(ok, Where).
  516: 
  517: close(Log) ->
  518:     wlr_logger ! {close, self(), Log},
  519:     rec(ok, ?LINE).
  520: 
  521: sync(Log) ->
  522:     wlr_logger ! {sync, self(), Log},
  523:     rec(ok, ?LINE).
  524: 
  525: log_terms(File, Terms) ->
  526:     wlr_logger ! {log_terms, self(), File, Terms},
  527:     rec(ok, ?LINE).
  528: 
  529: blog_terms(File, Terms) ->
  530:     wlr_logger ! {blog_terms, self(), File, Terms},
  531:     rec(ok, ?LINE).
  532: 
  533: rec1(M, Where) ->
  534:     receive 
  535:         {M, C} -> C;
  536:         Else -> ct:fail({error, {Where, Else}})
  537:     after 1000  -> ct:fail({error, {Where, time_out}})
  538:     end.
  539: 
  540: rec2(M, Where) ->
  541:     receive 
  542:         {C, M} -> C;
  543:         Else -> ct:fail({error, {Where, Else}})
  544:     after 1000  -> ct:fail({error, {Where, time_out}})
  545:     end.
  546: 
  547: rec(M, Where) ->
  548:     receive 
  549:         M ->
  550:             ok;
  551:         Else -> ct:fail({error, {Where, Else}})
  552:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error, {Where, time_out}})
  553:     end.
  554: 
  555: check_pps({Ports0,Procs0} = P0) ->
  556:     case pps() of
  557:         P0 ->
  558:             ok;
  559:         _ ->
  560:             timer:sleep(500),
  561:             case pps() of
  562:                 P0 ->
  563:                     ok;
  564:                 {Ports1,Procs1} = P1 ->
  565: 		    case {Ports1 -- Ports0, Procs1 -- Procs0} of
  566: 			{[], []} -> ok;
  567: 			{PortsDiff,ProcsDiff} ->
  568: 			    io:format("failure, got ~p~n, expected ~p\n", [P1, P0]),
  569: 			    show("Old port", Ports0 -- Ports1),
  570: 			    show("New port", PortsDiff),
  571: 			    show("Old proc", Procs0 -- Procs1),
  572: 			    show("New proc", ProcsDiff),
  573: 			    ct:fail(failed)
  574: 		    end
  575: 	    end
  576:     end.
  577: 
  578: show(_S, []) ->
  579:     ok;
  580: show(S, [{Pid, Name, InitCall}|Pids]) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  581:     io:format("~s: ~w (~w), ~w: ~p~n",
  582:               [S, Pid, proc_reg_name(Name), InitCall,
  583:                erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
  584:     show(S, Pids);
  585: show(S, [{Port, _}|Ports]) when is_port(Port)->
  586:     io:format("~s: ~w: ~p~n", [S, Port, erlang:port_info(Port)]),
  587:     show(S, Ports).
  588: 
  589: pps() ->
  590:     timer:sleep(100),
  591:     {port_list(), process_list()}.
  592: 
  593: port_list() ->
  594:     [{P,safe_second_element(erlang:port_info(P, name))} ||
  595:         P <- erlang:ports()].
  596: 
  597: process_list() ->
  598:     [{P,process_info(P, registered_name),
  599:       safe_second_element(process_info(P, initial_call))} ||
  600:         P <- processes(), erlang:is_process_alive(P)].
  601: 
  602: proc_reg_name({registered_name, Name}) -> Name;
  603: proc_reg_name([]) -> no_reg_name.
  604: 
  605: safe_second_element({_,Info}) -> Info;
  606: safe_second_element(Other) -> Other.
